name: Corporate Loan
description: Provides services such as loans, risk management, and asset disposal for corporate customers.

overview.summary: Provides a full-process corporate credit solution covering customer management, credit approval, contracts, disbursement, repayment, post-loan, and asset disposal, and strengthens enterprise risk control through a unified credit limit and namelist system.

modules.name: Corporate Loan
modules.description: Responsible for core process management of corporate loan business, supporting the entire process from customer access to post-loan management.

functions.title: Customer Management
functions.description: Entry and maintenance of customer information.

functions.title: Credit Application and Approval
functions.description: Management of corporate loan credit applications and approvals.

functions.title: Contract Management
functions.description: Contract management within corporate loan business processes.

functions.title: Drawdown Application and Approval
functions.description: Management of corporate loan disbursement applications and approvals.

functions.title: Product Management
functions.description: Logic handling related to corporate loan core system product management.

functions.title: Loan Note Management
functions.description: Handling logic for corporate loan note management.

functions.title: Accounting Management
functions.description: Responsible for accounting at the loan note level, generating detailed accounts, subsidiary ledgers, and general ledger information for each note.

functions.title: Repayment Management
functions.description: Management of repayment functions for corporate loan notes.

functions.title: Post-loan Management
functions.description: Post-loan management of corporate loan notes, including interest adjustment, write-off management, etc.

functions.title: Operations Management
functions.description: Responsible for version releases, daily operations issue troubleshooting, and follow-up actions in corporate loan business.

functions.title: Configuration Management
functions.description: Managing and configuring system basic settings, including title maintenance, logo configuration, etc.

modules.name: Enterprise Risk
modules.description: Provides unified credit limit management and risk namelist monitoring for corporate customers.

functions.title: Credit Limit Management and Control
functions.description: Issuance, occupation, release, and write-off of customer credit limits.

functions.title: Credit Information Management
functions.description: Used to query credit information, view customer credit limits, usage, balance, etc.

functions.title: Credit Status Management
functions.description: Queries credit information; enables freezing, unfreezing, and termination of credit, and handles approval and review of these actions.

functions.title: Configuration Management
functions.description: Management of credit products and batch configurations.

functions.title: Corporate Risk List Management
functions.description: Functions for querying, importing, editing, and deleting corporate client blacklists.

functions.title: Blacklist Query
functions.description: Querying corporate blacklist information.

modules.name: Asset Disposal
modules.description: Provides collection operations and system management functions for overdue assets.

functions.title: Collection Management
functions.description: Allows collection agents to view assigned case details, update case status, add notes, ensuring transparency and traceability in the collection process.

functions.title: Permission Management
functions.description: Controls user access and operation permissions (view, edit, delete, etc.) to ensure data security and integrity; also manages access permissions to system interfaces.

functions.title: Data Processing
functions.description: Acquires raw data from multiple sources and performs data cleaning, transformation, and aggregation to ensure data accuracy and consistency.

functions.title: Reporting and Analysis
functions.description: Generates various reports but does not provide advanced data analysis or visualization tools; users can export reports to Excel or other analysis tools for further processing.

functions.title: System Management
functions.description: Manages institutions, case assignment groups, users, etc.
